movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing.
movies.details: Directed by Christopher Nolan. Starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: Explorers travel through a wormhole in space to save humanity.
movies.details: Directed by Christopher Nolan. Starring Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces off against the Joker in Gotham.
movies.details: Directed by Christopher Nolan. Starring Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart.
